title: LA-20-09: Post-Government Employment Guidance on Executive Order 13770 (The Ethics Pledge)
summary:
This Legal Advisory provides guidance on the post-Government employment restrictions applicable to employees who signed the Ethics Pledge under E.O. 13770. The advisory expands on the post-Government employment guidance included in LA-17-03. 

Notes: [Executive Order 13770 has been revoked. “Employees and former employees subject to the commitments in Executive Order 13770 will not be subject to those commitments after noon January 20, 2021.”]
